descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 30 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Dance Dash is the definitive FULL BODY TRACKING game, with AI powered phone camera tracking streaming, with our FREE app for your mobile device. Fully compatible with Quest 2 & 3 standalone.
# ** Your Gateway to Full Body Tracking🕺**
[media]

Stomp the beats in this pulse-pounding, full body sensory symphony on your Quest Headset! Craft your own rhythm, groove to community maps, music, and mods. FREE TRIAL.

# **💃BUST A MOVE**
[media]

Dance Dash features intuitive mechanics like ducking, dodging, jumping, slapping, and especially shuffling, making it easy to play and highly engaging. Choreograph your most treasured tunes, and let the world know how you rock!

# **💫DD Editor to Create, Share, and Connect🌎**
[media]

Dive into the DD Editor (separate application), to create your own beatmaps for endless gameplay. Learn cool moves from influencers’ videos, or play original music videos in-game

Join our vibrant community of members from countries all over the world: discord.gg/dancedash!

Support: dancedash@rebuffreality.com
